name: berry-juice
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.
